title:
Large 2 Acre Lot For Sale -- Richmond, TX (Fort Bend County)

7419 Rolling Meadow Dr, Richmond TX 77469...

object.content:
Large 2 Acre Lot For Sale -- Richmond, TX (Fort Bend County)

7419 Rolling Meadow Dr, Richmond TX 77469
$118,400

Excellent large 2-acre lot for sale, Richmond, TX, with mature trees in quiet neighborhood. Country living with all the utilities available except the septic tank, which will be needed. Want horses? Two horses are allowed...one per acre. Build your dream home and live serenely while being close to shopping, restaurants, and hospital. Neighborhood has a park with playground, volleyball net, and gazebo.

Minimum building is 2000 sf with 2-car garage built within 12 months once building begins. 

For detailed information, contact Sheila Cox, Sugar Land Real Estate Agent, at 832-622-1233.

View more photos and video of neighborhood and lot at http://www.soldonsheila.com/featured_listings.htm
